document_data.mainbody: Heroes Feast Saving the Childrens Menu is an adventure module using the 5-edition  ruleset released by Wizards of the Coast on the D&D Beyond website on November 22, 2023. It is intended as a companion to Heroes Feast Flavors of the Multiverse An Official D&D Cookbook and is set in the Forgotten Realms in Daggerford and the Delimbiyr Vale. It also includes a recipe for macaroni and cheese.
